column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.3
#T_SP=webanno.custom.DemoNERRE|NamedentityTags
#T_RL=webanno.custom.DemoRE|NamedentityRelations|BT_webanno.custom.DemoNERRE
#Text=Polycrystalline sample of CCO was synthesized via solid state reaction method.
#Text=Stoichiometric amounts of high purity raw materials Cu2O (99.9%) and Cr2O3 (99.9%) were\rtaken and grounded thoroughly in liquid medium (Propanol).
#Text=Dried mixture was heated at\r1473 K for 12 hours in air with a heating rate of 5K/min.
#Text=Calcined powder was mixed with\rbinder, and pressed into pellets followed by sintering at 1200°C for 24 hours.

#Text=Phase purity of\rthe samples were confirmed by performing X-ray diffraction (XRD) measurements on Bruker\rD8 Advance diffractometer using laboratory x-ray source with Cu Kα radiation (wavelength ~1.54 Ǻ), having a LYNXEYE detector.
#Text=Measurement was carried out in Bragg- Brentano\rgeometry in 2θ range of 10 to 110° with step size of 0.01 and with the scan speed of 1.0\rsec/step.

#Text=XRD pattern was analyzed by performing Rietveld refinement using FullProf\rprogram.32 High resolution and high temperature SXRD measurements have also been\rperformed using ADXRD beamline33 BL-12, at Indus-2 synchrotron radiation source, at Raja\rRamanna Centre for Advanced Technology, Indore, India.
#Text=Measurements were performed on\rsix circle diffractometer (Huber 5020) using Mythen detector.
#Text=Mythen detector is one\rdimensional position sensitive detector consisting of 1280 channels.
#Text=Resistive heater was\rused for heating the sample.
#Text=Measurements were performed in θ-2θ mode.
#Text=The X-ray wave\rlength used in the present study is 0.756 Å and was accurately calibrated by measuring XRD\rpattern of NIST LaB6 standard.

#Text=X-ray absorption near edge spectroscopy (XANES)\rmeasurements at Cr (5989eV) and Cu (8979eV) K edge have been performed at Scanning\rEXAFS beamline BL-0934, in transmission mode at Indus-2, synchrotron radiation source, at\rRaja Ramanna Centre for Advanced Technology, Indore, India.
#Text=The incident and transmitted\rintensities were measured using gas filled ionization chamber detectors.
#Text=XANES spectra for\rCu and Fe foils were also measured in the same geometry for energy calibration.
#Text=WAYNE\rKERR 6500B impedance analyzer has been used for temperature dependent (100K-480K)\rdielectric measurements in the frequency range of 3kHz to 110kHz.
#Text=Temperature dependent\rmeasurements were performed using CRYOCON 22C temperature controller.
#Text=Temperature\rof the sample was varied from 100K to 480K at a rate of 2K per minute.
#Text=Silver paste was\rused for making electrical contacts on samples.
#Text=Complex impedance analysis was performed\rby least-mean-square analysis using EC lab software.
#Text=Raman measurements have been\rcarried out using LABRAM HR dispersive spectrometer equipped with a 633nm excitation\rlaser source and a CCD detector in backscattered mode.
#Text=For temperature dependent\rmeasurements THMS600 stage from Linkam having accuracy of 0.1K is used.
#Text=Temperature\rdependent pyroelectric current measurement was performed on sample using 6517B,\rKeithley electrometer.
